body.willUnlinkFromYourAccount: This action unlink the miner with your CIDgravity account. It's a none destructive action, the miner will keep running and working with CIDgravity.
body.beCareful: This action unlink the miner with your CIDgravity account. It's a none destructive action, the miner will keep running and working with CIDgravity.
body.signNewMessage: Claim the miner again to relink it.
